column4: hi, I'm trying to set up xubuntu to serve some files for a PXE boot. I'm a little confused on setting up the dhcp/tftp server
my regular network is under interface wlan0, and used the 192.168.1.x subnet, I want the PXE "network" to use the 192.168.10.x subnet, what should I put under "gateway" in the interfaces file?
the address the system will get internet from
